TopicTitle: Sometimes Posts Aren't Added To Post Count?

Articles.Content:
Is there a certain amount of time you have to wait until you post again for it to count as a post? As of now it says I have 152 posts, but when I look at my recent posts it says I have 170+

Is this intentional?
I think some forums don't increase your post count number.
I don't think that posts in the Space Lounge count toward your total post count.
That is correct, we only count the KSP-related posts - I guess that's a tradition.
